content: marmalade skies mater ials -100 grams of dragonfly dyeworks sparkle sock in p andoras box mc -20 grams of heritage sock in purple cc -2 25mm needles this pattern was written for two circular needles but can easily be knit using magic loop or d pns -1 stitch marker -tapestr y needle gau ge 8 5 stitches per inch in stockinette picture yourself in a boat on a river with tangerine trees and marmalade skies this sock was inspired by the beatles song lucy in the sky with diamonds it is full of colour and dream like images it reminds me of the yarn induced high i feel when i walk into my lys and stumble upon a new shipment of hand dyed yarn �1 abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together sl1 slip one stitch sm slip marker ssk slip a stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to knit and knit both stitches together through the back loops sts stitches yo yarn over ** instructions are worked as a group as specified diamond pattern round 1 *knit 2 k2tog yo knit 8* repeat until end of round round 2 knit all sts round 3 *knit 1 k2tog yo k2tog yo knit 7* repeat until end of round round 4 knit all sts round 5 *knit 2 k2tog yo knit 8* repeat until end of round round 6 7 8 knit all sts round 9 *knit 8 k2tog yo knit 2* repeat until end of round round 10 knit all sts round 11 *knit 7 k2tog yo k2tog yo knit 1* repeat until end of round round 12 knit all sts round 13 * knit 8 k2tog yo knit 2* repeat until end of round round 14 15 16 knit all sts here we go cuff using mc loosely co 72 sts join in the round and work p1 k2 ribbing for 20 rounds or 1 5 inches leg knit 3 rounds then begin working the diamond pattern continue knitting the diamond pattern for 3 full repeats and end with round 8 of 4th diamond pattern repeat �2 heel flap the heel flap will be worked on the first 36 stitches in the contrasting colour do not cut the main colour just leave it for now and begin working with the cc knit 36 stitches turn sl1 p to end begin eye of partridge heel flap pattern row 1 *sl1 k1* across end with k1 row 2 sl1 p to end row 3 sl2 *k1 sl1* across end with k2 row 4 sl1 p to end continue in this pattern until you have worked eye of partridge heel pattern for 32 row turn heel row 1 sl1 k19 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 knit to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 purl to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches
